entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 25 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
